About Cloudcandy Host[cc]

CloudCandy has been offering the best web hosting services with 24/7/365 support. We provide Fast and Powerful Dedicated servers that help transform Businesses and help them thrive. We have been an reliable hosting partner for business websites to ecommerce and beyond. Our Hosting solutions are building platform for the Connected World. We currently operate from two locations UK and India.


Top reasons to choose Cloudcandy Host[cc] ?:

Dedicated Support : Our support teams are here 24/7/365 — Support via chat, Skype, Ticketing System, Telephony and Forums. — to answer your questions and keep your sites up and running. Our knowledge and experienced technical support team helps you at each stage of server deployment.

Affordable : Cloudcandy Host[cc] gives you more for your money. Faster hardware, smarter software, and top-notch support.

Multiple Datacenter locations - Our server are at multiple locations. From CA USA, Germany, Netherlands, Russia and India . We are present locally and internationally. New locations coming soon!
